title: Ep. 102 - How To Protect Men From False Rape Accusations
description:
There have been several stories in the news recently about men who were falsely accused of rape. Some of them went to prison. All of them had their lives and reputations ruined. The problem of false accusations is very real and must be addressed by prosecuting and sentencing false accusers just as harshly as we do rapists.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
